Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.scene

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    GenericSceneController
    Interface used to define all the Scene Controller.
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    AnyForProdIncSceneController
    This Scene Controller is used to ask how the player wants to convert their income Any resources.
    AnyForProdPaySceneController
    This Scene Controller is used to ask how the player wants to convert their Any resources used for payment.
    AnySceneController
    This Scene Controller is used to asks the initial resources the player wants to get.
    AskCardsForProdSceneController
    This Scene Controller is used to asks the player to choose the cards they want to activate for production.
    AskProductionSceneController
    This Scene Controller is used to asks the player to choose how they want to play the production activation.
    AskSlotSceneController
    This Scene Controller is used to asks the player to pay resources and choose the slot to put the card they just bought.
    BoardSceneController
    This Scene Controller manages the main scene of the game.
    ChooseConversionSceneController
    This Scene Controller allows the player to choose between two available marble conversion.
    ChooseDevCardSceneController
    This Scene Controller allows the player to choose a card in the market.
    ChooseLeaderToKeep
    This Scene Controller manages the initial choice between four Leader Cards.
    ChooseLeaderToPlay
    This Scene Controller allows the player to choose the leader card to be played or discarded.
    ChoosePlayerSceneController
    This Scene Controller allows the player to see another player's board.
    ExtraDepotSceneController
    This Scene Controller allows the player to store resources in the extra depot.
    InitSceneController
    Allows a player to connect to a server.
    LobbySceneController
    Allows a player to join a certain lobby providing a username and the name of the game.
    LoseSceneController
    This Scene Controller shows the player their lose scene.
    MarketSceneController
    This Scene allow the player to get resources from market.
    MessageSceneController
    Shows a generic message.
    NumPlayerSceneController
    This Scene Controller is used to ask the player how many players he wants.
    PlaceResourcesSceneController
    This Scene Controller is used to ask the player to choose where he wants place resources in warehouse.
    ShowPlayerSceneController
    This Scene Controller is used to show the requested player's board.
    StartSceneController
    This Scene Controller is used to start the game.
    WinSceneController
    This Scene Controller is used to show at the player the winner and final victory points
